description: &cIllagers&r come in many varieties, with basic &cPillagers&r wielding &3Crossbows&r.
Killing a &3Banner&r-bearing &cCaptain Pillager&r inflicts &3Bad Omen&r, initiating a &4Raid&r at the next village visited unless &eCleansed&r.
In raids and mansions &cVindicators&r appear, moving fast and wielding &3Iron Axes&r - and &cEvokers&r, dangerous spellcasters.
Evokers have a vulnerable &dcooldown between spells&r, which include summoning &3Ground Jaws&r, or summoning flying &cVexes&r.
Finally, &cRavagers&r are large mounted beasts that spawn purely in &4Raids&r, and are best taken out &dfrom below or while distracted&r.
